content: I’d argue that both types discussed are really one and the same; neoliberalism. All about supply side via tax cuts to global corporations or the rich. It’s the same thing. The whole developed world is infected with it including the euro project which is massive neoliberalism with a better safety net. Look at the masses of unemployed in Europe. That’s not good for anyone. You want to put the pieces together of how we got here read Naomi Klein’s shock doctrine. Alternatively there is a dock of it on YouTube but haven’t watched it. It will blow your mind how it started with Friedman and the Chicago boys, Chile and Argentina then Reagan and Thatcher.
